= '''NOTE: This is now core yum functionality, using the downgrade command''' =

= allowdowngrade =
This plugin adds a --allow-downgrade flag to yum to make it possible to
manually downgrade packages to specific versions.


== How to install ==
Use the following command to install the allowdowngrade plugin
{{{
yum install yum-allowdowngrade
}}}
